name: Laser Defender (Nicolas Ayllon)
description:
This is a space shooter game I made as part of a course "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D" on udemy.com, featuring:

  • 3 enemy types and lasers
  • Player movement in all 4 directions
  • Health & Score systems
  • Game speed slowly increases

I used free resources from:

  • Sprites & Sounds: Kenney Game Studio
  • Music: "Through Space" by maxstack

Note: The game has no pause or save. The Quit button doesn't do anything.
